description:
Being cold is just as bad as overheating. This base layer top uses temperature regulating fabric to disperse body during strenuous activity.

  • Maetrx RedHEAT fibres manages body heat during high-output activities
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection and an antimicrobial finish
  • Anti-odour finish resists stink on long backcountry tours or multi-day backpacking adventures
  • Raglan sleeves allow full range of motion
  • Quarter-zip for customizable coverage
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Kombi RedHEAT Active Zip Top - Men's
